title: Netflix’s ‘Squid Game’ Is Slammed by Kim Jong Un’s Propagandists as ‘Beastly’
sub_head: The popular show depicts a South Korean society where ‘only money matters,’ a North Korean propaganda site says
body:
SEOUL—“Squid Game,” Netflix Inc.’s dystopian drama set in South Korea, is the top-watched show in more than 90 countries.
But one nation isn’t giving rave reviews: North Korea.
